Title: Shiyu's Letter
Text:
Here's Shiyu's stamp of approval: Shixia has officially reached the summit where this letter resides!

Shixia recently got accepted into the top school in Jinzhou and has set her sights on working for the Ministry of Development. She's come a long way and I can't help but feel proud and a little envious. Meanwhile, I'm still figuring out my own career path. Shixia joked about her intense studying habits again today, but I know she'll pass with flying colors â€” she's always been dedicated and doesn't even take breaks to hang out with me during vacation. I can hardly believe her good luck, but I couldn't be happier for her.
